title: Deps Tree
description: Allows to visualize and navigate a package.json file, resolving its dependencies and displaying them as a tree. Made with Three.js + Node

title: if it's people or you not
description: Remixed videoclip with words instead of pixels. Made with HTML Canvas

title: Triangles
description: Bouncing lines until it looks good. Made with p5.js

title: Rec Tree
description: Algorithmic generation of trees. It's what you're seeing as a background of this site

title: Words
description: Text falling down. Made with matter.js and p5.js
